label: Doctoral Wind Band Conducting
description: Advanced study in wind band conducting performance, pedagogy, score study/ analysis, and rehearsal techniques. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Admission into the doctoral concentration in wind band conducting; for doctoral cognate students, consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Admission into the doctoral concentration in wind band conducting; for doctoral cognate students, consent of instructor.
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
